alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Cass; Clay; Jackson; Johnson; Lafayette; Ray (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 1:27AM CDT until July 05 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Cass County in west central Missouri... Eastern Clay County in west central Missouri... Ray County in west central Missouri... Western Carroll County in north central Missouri... Lafayette County in west central Missouri... Jackson County in west central Missouri... Johnson County in west central Missouri... * Until 215 AM CDT. * At 127 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Polo to near Garden City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Independence, Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Raymore, Warrensburg, Grain Valley, Excelsior Springs, Harrisonville, Pleasant Hill, Oak Grove, Richmond, Odessa, Greenwood, Higginsville, Lexington, Peculiar, Buckner, Lawson, Concordia and Holden. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 15 and 59. Interstate 470 between mile markers 8 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Cass; Clay; Jackson; Johnson; Lafayette; Ray
